article: a co-defendant in the trial of lynne f. stewart , a lawyer accused of aiding terrorists , sent letters and small amounts of money to imprisoned muslims who had been convicted in the #### bombing of the world trade center and in a separate failed bomb plot , according to testimony in federal court monday .
